DamageImmunities: Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Chemical Defense
Traits.Content: When a creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the Bryozoa, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 2d6 poison damage and become poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Traits.Name: Colony Mind
Traits.Content: The Bryozoa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it, allowing it to respond to intruders effectively as part of its collective awareness.

Actions.Name: Tentacle Whip
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, one target. On a hit, the target takes 9 (1d12 + 3) bludgeoning damage and must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pulled 10 feet closer to the Bryozoa.

Actions.Name: Corrosive Spore Burst
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, one target within 30 feet. On a hit, the target takes 6 (1d6 + 3) acid damage and must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.
